EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual Health Monitor: What It Does.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor
Forever and Free, As Monitoring Should Be.
A few days back, you downloaded VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor. You now have mountaintop visibility into your virtual environment, wielding the power to identify risks in real time. Performance reports? All yours. In perpetuity. Forever.
Interested in learning more about what VHM can do? Click here <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/VMT-Virtual-Health-Monitor-Data-Sheet-Oct-20142.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhmnurture>.
In good health, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
